data.eml:eml: Distostylus gen. nov., a monotypic therevine genus (Diptera: Asiloidea: Therevidae) from the Caribbean Island of Dominica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Metz, Mark A., Webb, Donald W. (2003): Distostylus gen. nov., a monotypic therevine genus (Diptera: Asiloidea: Therevidae) from the Caribbean Island of Dominica. Zootaxa 222: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156593
